name: Block Owl
description:
Use the Left and Right arrow Keys if you are playing from computer

How long can you continue to shoot precisely? Can you keep up the shooting pace in this tap arcade shooter? Blocking the owl with few precise shots is not enough. Show that you can keep up the cannon shoot pace because the owl will move in unpredictable paths and positions. The combination of owl games tap shooter and unpredictable movements is turned into a nail-biting gaming experience.
